name: Project TITAN - Prototype
description:
This is the second prototype for "Project TITAN", a new top-down shooter with survival horror elements. This prototype is intended to test this new concept idea; all your comments will truly make a difference for further development. This prototype/game is planned to be developed with Godot Engine.

======== CONTROLS ========

W/S/A/D   Move
Mouse   Focus
Left Click   Shoot
Right Click   Dash
R   Reload
Space   Time Stop
1   Switch to previous Character
2   Switch to next Character
ESC Pause Menu

Thank you for playing!!
